title: seinfeld S5E7

So there were a lot of people there? What are you gonna do, sit in the doctor's office doing this? He's gonna think you're a mental patient. I don't care. Look, Lloyd doesn't know what he's up against. This is nothing to me. Three days he hasn't called me, and you know why? Because he thinks I'm too fat. -He said that? -No. But I saw the look on his face when he put his arm around me.
